name: Galactic Dreamstar
description:
This is a simple 2D shmup where you must brave an asteroid belt before being bombarded with a hoard of enemies. The ultimate test awaits you after successfully destroying enough enemy ships

Controls:

Arrow keys/WASD - Movement

Shoot - Space

Shield - Q

Charge Shot - N (hold until player character changes from red to blue)

Missile - M

Pause - Esc

Assets:

Font by Jakob Fischer (https://www.pizzadude.dk/)

Music by xDeviruchi (https://xdeviruchi.itch.io/8-bit-fantasy-adventure-music-pack)

Ship and explosion art from craftpix.net

Miscellaneous sound effects from pixabay.com and mixkit.co
